They weren't scientologists, that Tom Cruise. They were scientists. They are "evil" because in galileo's time and newton's time, both of whom are said to be apart of the Illuminati, religion was absolute. Typical example: Galileo was klilled by the church due to his Heliocentric model, whereas the church used the geocentric model. This Illuminati philosophy you've presented is bullshit.
